meanings.definition: The quality or state of being raucous.
meanings.sent1: The raucousnesses of the party made it hard to hear.
meanings.sent2: The raucousnesses of the children playing outside could be heard from afar.
meanings.sent3: The raucousnesses of the puppies playing in the yard was both adorable and noisy.
meanings.sent4: The raucousnesses of the thunderstorm echoed through the night.
meanings.sent5: The raucousnesses of the city streets at night can be overwhelming for some.

meanings.definition: The loud and rowdy behavior or sound of a group of people.
meanings.sent1: The raucousnesses of the fans at the concert added to the excitement.
meanings.sent2: The raucousnesses of the crowd at the sports game could be heard from miles away.
meanings.sent3: The raucousnesses of the family reunion was a mix of laughter and chatter.
meanings.sent4: The raucousnesses of the market on a busy day was like a symphony of voices.
meanings.sent5: The raucousnesses of the school cafeteria during lunchtime was a familiar sound.
